description:
Banish bugs outdoors with Bug Doom

The Indoor & Outdoor Pest Kit pairs Bug Doom Indoor and Bug Doom Outdoor to deliver safe, effective pest control throughout your home.

Bug Doom Indoor Spray uses chrysanthemum extract and canola oil to quickly eliminate pests inside your home. Bug Doom Outdoor Spray forms a protective barrier around your home with natural ingredients, keeping pests away for up to 4 weeks. Together, these products provide an easy way to maintain a pest-free environment.

Sunday creates effective pest control solutions that care for your home and the world around it.

sections.kit_benefits:
Comprehensive indoor and outdoor pest control kit
Kills dozens of pests including ants, spiders, cockroaches, and more
Repels and prevents pests for up to 4 weeks
Formulated without harsh chemicals—derived from chrysanthemum extract and canola oil
Made for any yard and home
Easy to use and apply safely
sections.whats_included:
1 Bug Doom Indoor Insect Control Spray: Chrysanthemum extract and canola oil-based spray to control various indoor pests. Coverage varies.
1 Bug Doom Outdoor Insect Control Spray: Chrysanthemum extract and canola oil-based spray to control outdoor perimeter pests. Covers up to 1,500 sq. ft.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply when pests are active and it’s dry outside. Shake well before use.
Apply Bug Doom Indoor: Spray directly onto bugs, areas pests frequent, or can enter the home, like doorways and windows. Reapply as needed.
Apply Bug Doom Outdoor: Attach and use the included motorized wand sprayer for application. Spray Bug Doom Outdoor 1 foot up and 1 foot out from your home's foundation to create a protective barrier. Spot treat any known infestation areas as needed. Reapply every 2-4 weeks to maintain a strong barrier.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply this kit?
Start treatments in early spring and continue through fall to prevent and control pest populations. In warmer climates, use year-round as needed.
What is Bug Doom effective on?
Bug Doom is effective against ants, spiders, beetles, cockroaches, bed bugs, and more. Check the label for detailed pest control information.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes! This kit is designed to work with other Sunday products. Allow recommended dry time between liquid applications, and avoid getting baits wet for best results.
Is there a risk of staining?
Bug Doom contains canola oil, which has a slight risk of staining. We recommend testing in an inconspicuous area (especially on porous surfaces) before treating a larger area.
When will I see results?
Expect immediate impact on pests from Bug Doom with lasting protection, up to 4 weeks when used as directed.
Any state restrictions?
This product is approved for use in all states.
Always read pest control labels for best results and safety for you and the environment.
Any state restrictions?
This product is approved for use in all states.
Always read pest control labels for best results and safety for you and the environment.
